mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id , p.creator_id, p.tag, p.title, p.description , p.project_thumbnail_img , p.project_date , p.project_hits, p.category1, p.category2_pj, o.price FROM project p JOIN project_options o ON p.project_id = o.project_id ORDER BY p.project_hits DESC LIMIT 9

SELECT a.*, count(r.project_review_id) review_count, AVG(r.rating) AS average_reviews, (select ps.price from project_package_single ps where a.project_id = ps.project_id) price FROM project a LEFT JOIN project_review r ON a.project_id = r.project_id GROUP BY a.project_id order by average_reviews desc limit #{limit}
